item.title: By: Kyle Hayes (@kylehayes)
item.dc:creator: Kyle Hayes (@kylehayes)
item.description: Thank you for such an eloquent post of some guiding rules to follow with API design. I've been working on something similar but much prefer your wording. Thank you!
item.content:encoded: Thank you for such an eloquent post of some guiding rules to follow with API design. I’ve been working on something similar but much prefer your wording. Thank you!

item.description: […] In the software world, we often refer to building ‘extensible’ designs. In essence, this means that we can build a system that is light and nimble, capable of changing and growing over time. ...  […]
